Text:
Please seed for as long as possible.

Enjoy.
How long are the minisodes? A couple of them are very large files

The files are large because some of them are 1080p and some are blu-ray. I didn't mention it in the title because not all files are like that and I didn't want to mislead anyone. To be honest, the 1080p and blu-ray files are no better quality than the DVDrips I used for the first 2 seasons. All files will work on all PC's and all TV's. You don't need a HD set to watch them.

Does anyone know where to find the order of the extras?
I would like to watch this again with the extras in the right place between episodes.
seed please

Am I the only one to notice that Season 3, Episode 4 has the wrong audio?  Yes, somehow the audio in S3E4 is the same audio track from Season 3, Episode 3.  I'd be interested to know how this could have accidentally happened.  

I haven't checked yet to see if there are any other messed up files.

Subtitles would be nice.

there is a whole bunch of dialogue in spanish S3/E3 that would be nice to know what they are discussing!

Shrude, you need to get .srt files that correspond to the .avi files you using.  I got my .srt files at
http://www.anysubs.com/movie_details.php?movie_id=6597&season=0

Don't know what to tell you, Shrude, other than the .srt files I got off of AnySubs.com worked perfectly with the .avi files I got from this torrent.  You must rename the .srt file to the exact name of the .avi file or it won't work.  

The ONLY problem I've found with this torrent (so far) is the S3E4 vid somehow had S3E3 audio.

Thanks dude! This is a great download! Excellent quality. Hard English subtitles would be appreciated for the Mexican scenes though. My program won't recognize any subtitles so we don't know what they say. Hard English subs are always good!

To all of you who are bitching like little girls about S3E4 specially the one person who even said he did not watch anymore of the episodes, this is a very easy fix, look for the one file that is wrong from a different source and re download it, stop being a bunch of little bitches, the other easy solution, grab your wallet and go to the store, like Target or any store that sells DVD series and buy the freaking DVD.....Fucking A man!!!!! have some respect IMBD did a great job by facilitating this show to us for free and you still bitch because one file is wrong?, thank for the upload awesome job....

Breaking Bad is a RL based show... so it makes sense not to have subs... this show isn't based in china where everyone is speaking different... watch the show, watch/listen to the situation and figure it out for urselves morons... nice torrent btw srry 2 clog, hope A/V is good
